item.description:
This is a fundraiser for AIDS Project RI and AIDS Care Ocean State!

Doors open at 6:00 and Bingo starts promptly at 7:00. I strongly recommend you get there by 6:00 as parking becomes very limited even when doors open.

 

Bingo cards are $20 each. Dobbers are $2 if you don't have your own. There are plenty of drinks and food to purchase, just no alcohol.

 

It is a very fun night and all proceeds go to a good cause. Dress as your own version of Cupid and you have a chance to win an awesome prize. The bingo prizes themselves are pretty killer. There is a chance of winning $100 up to $1,000 for the jackpot game. Anticipate being there for two hours. Tons of fun!!! Bring everyone you know!!!

 

 If there are more than 10 people wanting to go, I can call for a reservation. It doesn't guarantee seating upstairs, but we will have a better shot at prime seating.
item.how_to_find_us: If there is enough people for a reservation, the people at the door will show you where the table is. If not, I will be waiting outside with a purple scarf!
item.name: Cupid is Stupid Gay Bingo
